quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I know I'm hurt but if I can still move at all, I can't stay still. I have to do something.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I-I've got a lot to say to you, but...that'll have to come later...!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: The lesson for me here truly is that we should always create competition with people firstly.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: You're the best. That’s why I want to defeat You!.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: Your power… is your own!!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: That's right. Don't worry about what other people think! Hold your head up high and plunge forward!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: A hero's job is to risk his life to turn his promises into reality.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I wanna be like him. For that, I gotta be number one. I gotta be the strongest. Might seem like a lame motivation... Compared to yours..

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: He just didn’t abandon it in vain, like you did. He was trying to live up to his ideals, I think.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: To help others you have to be able to take care of yourself

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: When the enemy becomes certain of their victory, that will be our chance.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: He’s not standing at the top of U.A. because he was born strong. He worked incredibly hard to get to that point.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I'm no longer the useless Deku who can't do anything right... I'm the Deku who gives it his all!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: All men are not created equal.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: Secondly, if you can create competition with the person who you look up to or is way better than you because that makes you patch up and put you in a situation where you are able to learn and get better extremely faster than normal.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I have to work harder than anyone else to make it! I’ll never catch up otherwise.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: Because it's like All Might said...giving help that's not asked for... is what makes a true hero!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: If I match the pace with everyone else then I'll never be number one.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I'm not gonna be your worthless punching bag Deku forever... Kacchan. I'm... I'm the Deku who always does his best!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I want to be like you...! Like you. The strongest hero.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I need to get many times stronger than everyone else!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: My motivation might seem trivial compared to yours, but I can't lose, either. I have to live up to the hopes of those who supported me.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: Dreams can become reality!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: A hero's job is to risk his life, to make his lip service a reality.

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: A smiling...Dependable...Cool hero...That's what I wanna be! That's why I'm giving it everything! For everyone!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: I’ll do my best! Whatever you say, All Might… I’ll step up to the challenge! As long as you’re by my side, I can do anything… That’s how I feel, anyway!

quotes.speaker: Midoriya Izuku
quotes.quote: If I can't save the one small girl in front of me, how can I become a hero that saves everyone?
